properties.entry: SELECT 'hanok' "TYPE", COUNT(RESERVATION_NO) "COUNT" FROM HANOK_RESERVATION WHERE FROM_DATE>SYSDATE UNION ALL SELECT 'horse', COUNT(RESERVATION_NO) FROM HORSE_RESERVATION WHERE HORSE_DATE>SYSDATE UNION ALL SELECT 'month', COUNT(RESERVATION_NO) FROM MONTH_RESERVATION WHERE START_DATE>SYSDATE UNION ALL SELECT 'tea', COUNT(RESERVATION_NO) FROM TEA_RESERVATION WHERE START_DATE>SYSDATE

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, MEM_ID, SUBSTR(PHONE,1,3)||'-****-'||SUBSTR(PHONE,10,12) "PHONE", HORSE_PRO_NAME "TYPE", TO_CHAR(HORSE_DATE) "START_DATE", HR.STATUS "STATUS" FROM HORSE_RESERVATION HR JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN HORSE_PROGRAM USING(HORSE_PRO_NO) WHERE HORSE_DATE >=(SYSDATE-1) ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, MEM_ID, SUBSTR(PHONE,1,3)||'-****-'||SUBSTR(PHONE,10,12) "PHONE", ROOM_TYPE "TYPE", TO_CHAR(FROM_DATE) "START_DATE", HK.STATUS "STATUS" FROM HANOK_RESERVATION HK JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN ROOM_INFO USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE FROM_DATE >=(SYSDATE-1) ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, MEM_ID, SUBSTR(PHONE,1,3)||'-****-'||SUBSTR(PHONE,10,12) "PHONE", COURSE_NUM "TYPE", TO_CHAR(START_DATE) "START_DATE", T.STATUS "STATUS" FROM TEA_RESERVATION T JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE START_DATE >=(SYSDATE-1) ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, MEM_ID, SUBSTR(PHONE,1,3)||'-****-'||SUBSTR(PHONE,10,12) "PHONE", LODGE_NAME "TYPE", TO_CHAR(START_DATE) "START_DATE", M.STATUS "STATUS" FROM MONTH_RESERVATION M JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN MONTH_INFO USING(LODGE_NO) WHERE START_DATE >=(SYSDATE-1) ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC
